# Business Model Canvas – Decentralized Freelance Marketplace

## 1. Value Proposition
- Borderless freelance marketplace powered by blockchain
- Instant crypto payouts with low fees
- Trust‑less escrow via smart contracts

## 2. Customer Segments
- Tech‑savvy freelancers seeking crypto payments
- Start‑ups & DAOs needing on‑demand talent
- Global clients preferring decentralized transactions

## 3. Channels
- Web app & mobile dApp
- Crypto community forums & Discord
- Partnerships with blockchain wallets

## 4. Customer Relationships
- Self‑service onboarding with wallet integration
- Community‑driven support via Discord
- Automated reputation system via on‑chain ratings

## 5. Revenue Streams
- 2% transaction fee on crypto payouts
- Premium subscription for enhanced visibility ($15/mo)
- Marketplace token utility fees

## 6. Key Resources
- Smart‑contract infrastructure
- Liquidity pool for crypto payouts
- Legal & compliance team specialized in AML/KYC

## 7. Key Activities
- Develop & audit smart contracts
- Maintain liquidity & price stability
- Monitor regulatory changes and ensure compliance

## 8. Key Partners
- Layer‑2 scaling solution (e.g., Polygon)
- Crypto KYC provider (e.g., CipherTrace)
- Legal counsel for crypto regulations

## 9. Cost Structure
- Smart‑contract development & audits ($200k initial)
- Regulatory compliance & licensing ($100k per year)

- Marketing to crypto communities ($150k/yr)
